DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize different type starch vary effect appetite , blood sugar food intake . In study , subject consume five soup contain 50 g whole grain , high amylose corn , regular corn maltodextrin starch add starch one week interval . The investigator measure food intake 30 minute , appetite blood sugar .
DOC.brief_title: Types Starch Their Effect Blood Glucose , Appetite Food Intake
